p: The MnO percentage in the nanocomposite was determined by ICP, briefly described as follows: an as-made MnO@C nanocomposite sample was mixed with H 2SO 4 (1â€…M) to fully dissolve the MnO content, and the supernatant was collected and measured by ICP, which showed the concentration of Mn 2+. In addition, no other metal ions were detected by ICP, suggesting the purity of our samples. The mass percentage of MnO was then calculated based on the measured Mn 2+ concentration and the original sample mass.
